text: Dughiar kamɨn Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn azirakar bar ekiam an aven otogham. Mati, me fomɨra Megidon danganir zarimɨn ikia, asem Hadatrimon bagha bar puvɨram azi moghɨn, men azirakam an mɨrara mangam.12:11 Fofozir gumazir avɨriba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Hadatrimon, an aser mamɨn ziam. Gumazamizir an ziam feba, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikia ghaze, an azenibar zurara dar dughiar vamɨran aremegham, eghtɨ me a bagh puvɨram aziam. Egha gɨn, me ghaze, a uam angamɨra iti.
